name: Creepy Pharmacist: All my patients are scary!
summary: Vampire, evil spirit, science and technology, potion, monster, Biochemist, fortune-teller, puppet.Lin En transmigrated to this kind of mysterious world, becoming a monster pharmacist’s apprentice. Fortunately, he has golden finger with him.【Ding! You cured Miss Mimo’s hated son, you obtained 《Enduring Medicine Formula》x1,500 skeleton coins, Miss Mimo’s favorability +100】【Ding! Your massage technique made the Blood Race Princess feel physically and mentally happy, you obtained 《Medicine: Eagle Vine’s Hand》x1,500 skeleton coins, Blood Race Princess’s reliance +100】【Ding! You had repaired the abstinence system puppet body damage, he obtained 《Secret Skill: Puppet Technique》, 500 skeleton coins, puppet lady favorability +200】In this monster-filled, evil spirit-less-than-dog dark world, he gradually reached the pinnacle of human life. Lin En: “Sorry, all root level monster doctors, if you want to kill me, please ask first if my patient agrees!”
author: 黑心小C
